comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This is taken at the end of Henry Ford's peace mission to Europe on the Oscar II failed. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peace_Ship "On December 23, Ford and Marquis slipped out of their hotel and boarded a ship back to the United States." Honolulu star-bulletin., January 01, 1916, 3:30 Edition, Page 18 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn82014682/1916-01-01/ed-... reports that he arrived in New York on 1/1/16 on the Norwegian steamer Bergensfjord after a stormy Atlantic crossing. The New York Sun., January 02, 1916, page 1 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030272/1916-01-02/ed-... reports on the imminent arrival of the Norwegwian ship. The difference in dates is presumably due to the time difference between New York and Honolulu.
